name: ListGithubWebhookDeliveries
description:
Fetch webhook delivery events for a specific GitHub repository.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of webhook deliveries for a specific webhook configured in a GitHub repository. It is useful for monitoring and debugging webhook events.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository (case insensitive).

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: webhook_hook_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the webhook. This is necessary to fetch the specific webhook deliveries for the repository.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of webhook delivery results to fetch per page, up to 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: pagination_start_cursor
parameters.description: The starting point for fetching the page of deliveries. Use the `link` header for next/previous page cursors.

value_schema.description: Used for pagination: the starting delivery from which the page of deliveries is fetched. Refer to the `link` header for the next and previous page cursors.

parameters.name: include_redelivered_events
parameters.description: Include redelivered webhook events in the results if set to true.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Used for pagination: the starting delivery from which the page of deliveries is fetched. Refer to the `link` header for the next and previous page cursors.

value_schema.description: Used for pagination: the starting delivery from which the page of deliveries is fetched. Refer to the `link` header for the next and previous page cursors.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: hook_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
